name: Ludum Dare 47: Stuck in a Loop
name_original: Ludum Dare 47: Stuck in a Loop
description:
First ever game!

Even though Ludum Dare 47 was last year I felt it was a good chance to practice my "Skills" in unity and to better myself, so I decided to do some past Ludum Dare's.

Theme for this Ludum Dare was "Stuck in a loop" and I had 48 hours to make everything you see from scratch.

Enjoy!
